column4: ah, okey then, well i partitioned my hd for windows xp and ubuntu, but when i log onto windows it says i have a virus already. mydoom, i have no clue how to download anti virus programs with linix here as i think i may have gotten it on this OS, cause i can see i file called test (which is one of the things this virus does, but it doesn't affect linux, only windows.) there, my problem :)
ah, other pple use this comp too
i guess i need to dl anti virus stuff for windows then

you can download something like clamav, mount your ntfs partition writeable, allow clamav to remove it, and then run the appropriate utilities to REPAIR your ntfs partition BEFORE booting back into windows.
